product_overview: This product provides user authentication with OTP via email and a robust email sending service leveraging Zoho OAuth2 SMTP through Nodemailer. It is designed to secure user access while ensuring reliable email communications.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication with OTP via email.
Integrate an email service using Zoho OAuth2 SMTP with Nodemailer.
Provide API endpoints for user authentication and email operations.
Ensure real-time features using WebSocket as applicable.
key_features: Email Service that sends emails via Zoho OAuth2 SMTP using Nodemailer.
User authentication API supporting OTP generation and validation.
Sending OTP emails securely and reliably.
REST API endpoints for login and authentication flows.
Technology stack includes Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Nodemailer, and Socket.io for real-time capabilities.
user_flow_summary: User initiates login by requesting an OTP with their email address.
System generates OTP and sends it to the user email via the email service.
User submits the received OTP for verification.
System validates OTP and authenticates the user, returning session/token as needed.
validation_criteria: OTP emails are delivered successfully to user inboxes in a timely manner.
User authentication endpoints correctly generate, send, and verify OTPs.
Email service uses Zoho OAuth2 SMTP and Nodemailer with no authentication errors.
API endpoints respond with appropriate status and error messages as per specification.
System supports multiple simultaneous authentication requests without degradation.

features.name: Email Service
features.description: Sends emails using Zoho OAuth2 (SMTP) via nodemailer.

features.name: Auth API
